name: Shadowmere
description: A dark, gothic city where vampires and werewolves rule the night. The city is built on layers of history, with ancient catacombs beneath modern streets.

entities.name: The Midnight Cathedral
entities.summary: An ancient cathedral that serves as the headquarters of the Vampire Council. The building is both a place of worship and a fortress, with hidden passages leading deep underground.

entities.name: The Howling District
entities.summary: A rundown neighborhood where werewolf packs gather. The area is known for its wild nightlife and dangerous back alleys where territorial disputes are settled.

entities.name: The Catacombs
entities.summary: A vast network of underground tunnels and chambers beneath Shadowmere. Home to ancient vampires, ghouls, and other undead creatures. Few who enter ever return.

entities.name: Elder Vampires
entities.summary: Ancient vampires who have lived for centuries. They possess incredible strength, speed, and mind-control abilities. They are the true rulers of Shadowmere's night.

entities.name: Werewolf Packs
entities.summary: Groups of werewolves who transform during the full moon. They are fiercely territorial and have a complex pack hierarchy. Some packs are more civilized than others.

entities.name: Ghouls
entities.summary: Undead creatures that inhabit the catacombs. They are mindless servants of the elder vampires, created from the remains of those who died in the catacombs.

entities.name: The Vampire Council
entities.summary: The ruling body of Shadowmere's vampire population. They maintain a fragile peace with the werewolf packs and control most of the city's political and economic power.

entities.name: The Moon Howlers
entities.summary: The largest and most organized werewolf pack in Shadowmere. They control the Howling District and have a tense truce with the Vampire Council.

entities.name: The Night Watch
entities.summary: A secret organization of humans and half-breeds who work to protect the innocent from the supernatural threats of Shadowmere. They operate in the shadows, unknown to most.

campaigns.name: Shadows of Shadowmere
campaigns.summary: A dark urban fantasy campaign set in the gothic city of Shadowmere. The party must navigate the dangerous politics between vampire clans and werewolf packs while uncovering a conspiracy that threatens the entire city.

scenes.name: Arrival in the City
scenes.summary: The party arrives in Shadowmere during the annual Festival of Shadows, unaware of the dark secrets that lurk beneath the celebrations.
